products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Harlow Asc Magnolia
products.description: Harlow asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind harlow asc magnolia available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
